content: I do not have personal opinions, but i can provide some information. it is difficult to predict the future of the hotel industry and whether they will fully catch up with airbnb's success. while hotels have responded to airbnb's disruptive impact by adopting new technology and developing their own rental programs, airbnb has firmly established itself as a top player in the lodging industry. the personalized and unique experiences that airbnb provides may continue to attract a certain demographic of travelers, whilst traditional hotels are more suitable for others. both options will continue to coexist, but the industry may continue to evolve to offer better customer experiences, transparency and flexible pricing models to maintain and grow customer base. it is important to note that the travel sector as a whole is constantly changing, with new players and advances in technology shaping how people travel, book accommodations, and share their experiences.
